title: Andrew Bowie – 2022 Comments on Rishi Sunak Becoming Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Andrew Bowie, the Conservative MP for West Aberdeenshire and Kincardine, on Twitter on 20 October 2022.
content: There is only one person that can unite this party, get the economy on a firm footing. Only one with the plan to move us forward. And that is the same person I believed in over the Summer. It has to be Rishi.
